titleStmt.title: Several letters; containing the amours of 1. The unfortunate dutchess; or, The lucky gamester. 2. Love after enjoyment; or, Fatal constancy. 3. The unhappy mistake; or, The fate of cross'd loves. Written by Mr. Cr----rd, gent.
titleStmt.author: Craufurd, David, 1665-1726.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Job Austin ... and sold by the booksellers of London and Westmister,

notesStmt.note: Each letter has special t.-p. "The unfortunate dutchess" also has separate pagination.
Imperfect: faded, stained with slight loss of text.
Reproduction of original in: University of Chicago.
